1270370.name: Bat of dead
1270370.description:
In a grim world where reality intertwines with nightmare, you are the last surviving guardian, armed with a legendary bat—an ancient artifact of unimaginable power. Every step is a fight for survival in a distorted realm filled with mutations, ghosts, and monsters eager to destroy you.

Bat of Dead is a brutal adventure where:

  • Every enemy is a deadly threat

  • The landscape constantly shifts and betrays you

  • The artifact in your hands is your only chance of salvation

  • Reality crumbles into fragments

  • The sounds of chaos and pain haunt your every move

Use your bat as a weapon, shield, and guide between worlds. Solve insane puzzles, battle unimaginable creatures, and try to maintain your sanity in this nightmarish journey.

Will you survive? Bat of Dead awaits its hero.
